pnp:ListInstance.Title: Calendar
pnp:ListInstance.Description: Manage project events and milestones with a shared calendar.

pnp:ListInstance.Title: Documents
pnp:ListInstance.Description: This system library was created by the Publishing feature to store documents that are used on pages in this site.

pnp:ListInstance.Title: Images
pnp:ListInstance.Description: This system library was created by the Publishing feature to store images that are used on pages in this site.

Field.Name: _Author
Field.Description: The primary author

Field.Name: _Comments
Field.Description: A summary of this asset

DisplayPattern.HTML: ); JavaScript:return false;">

Field.Name: Keywords
Field.Description: For example: scenery, mountains, trees, nature

Field.Name: AlternateThumbnailUrl
Field.Description: Link to the image that will be shown as the preview for this asset

Field.Name: VideoRenditionLabel
Field.Description: The text displayed in the video player for this rendition

Field.Name: VideoSetDescription
Field.Description: A summary of the Video

Field.Name: VideoSetOwner
Field.Description: The owner of the Video

Field.Name: VideoSetShowDownloadLink
Field.Description: Specifies whether a button appears on the video player page that allows the user to download the video being played.

Field.Name: VideoSetShowEmbedLink
Field.Description: Specifies whether a button appears on the video player that allows the user to get an embed code for the video being played.

Field.Name: PeopleInMedia
Field.Description: The people appearing in the video.

pnp:ListInstance.Title: Internal Documents
pnp:ListInstance.Description: This library is reserved for use by PSC personnel only.

Field.Name: RoutingRuleDescription
Field.Description: Provide a brief, but thorough, description.
The date and time of the meeting.
Field.Name: Meeting_x0020_Date

Field.Description: The end date of the week for which this status report was created.
Field.Name: For_x0020_Week_x0020_Ending_x0020_on_x0020_Date

Field.Description: The date this document was submitted to the client.
Field.Name: Submitted

Field.Description: The date on which this document was approved (signed off) by the client.
Field.Name: Signed_x0020_Off

pnp:ListInstance.Title: Pages
pnp:ListInstance.Description: This system library was created by the Publishing feature to store pages that are created in this site.

Field.Name: PublishingContact
Field.Description: Contact is a site column created by the Publishing feature. It is used on the Page Content Type as the person or group who is the contact person for the page.

Field.Name: PublishingContactEmail
Field.Description: Contact E-mail Address is a site column created by the Publishing feature. It is used on the Page Content Type as the e-mail address of the person or group who is the contact person for the page.

Field.Name: PublishingContactName
Field.Description: Contact Name is a site column created by the Publishing feature. It is used on the Page Content Type as the name of the person or group who is the contact person for the page.

Field.Name: PublishingContactPicture
Field.Description: Contact Picture is a site column created by the Publishing feature. It is used on the Page Content Type as the picture of the user or group who is the contact person for the page.

Field.Name: PublishingRollupImage
Field.Description: Rollup Image is a site column created by the Publishing feature. It is used on the Page Content Type as the image for the page shown in content roll-ups such as the Content By Search web part.

Field.Name: Audience
Field.Description: Target Audiences is a site column created by the Publishing feature. It is used to specify audiences to which this page will be targeted.

Field.Name: PublishingIsFurlPage
Field.Description: If checked, the physical URL of this page will not appear in search results. Friendly URLs assigned to this page will always appear.

Field.Name: SeoBrowserTitle
Field.Description: Browser Title is a site column created by the Publishing feature. It is used as the title that appears at the top of a browser window and may appear in Internet search results.

Field.Name: SeoMetaDescription
Field.Description: Meta Description is a site column created by the Publishing feature. Internet search engines may display this description in search results pages.

Field.Name: SeoKeywords
Field.Description: Meta Keywords

Field.Name: RobotsNoIndex
Field.Description: Hide from Internet Search Engines is a site column created by the Publishing feature. It is used to indicate to search engine crawlers that a particular page should not be indexed.

Field.Name: PublishingPageImage
Field.Description: Page Image is a site column created by the Publishing feature. It is used on the Article Page Content Type as the primary image of the page.

Field.Name: PublishingPageContent
Field.Description: Page Content is a site column created by the Publishing feature. It is used on the Article Page Content Type as the content of the page.

Field.Name: SummaryLinks
Field.Description: Summary Links is a site column created by the Publishing feature. It is used on the Welcome Page Content Type to display a set of links.

Field.Name: ArticleByLine
Field.Description: Byline is a site column created by the Publishing feature. It is used on the Article Page Content Type as the byline of the page.

Field.Name: ArticleStartDate
Field.Description: Article Date is a site column created by the Publishing feature. It is used on the Article Page Content Type as the date of the page.

Field.Name: PublishingImageCaption
Field.Description: Image Caption is a site column created by the Publishing feature. It is used on the Article Page Content Type as the caption for the primary image displayed on the page.

Field.Name: SummaryLinks2
Field.Description: Summary Links 2 is a site column created by the Publishing feature. It is used on the Welcome Page Content Type to display a second set of links.

Field.Name: RoutingRuleDescription
Field.Description: Provide a brief, but thorough, description.
Indicate the status of this RAID log entry.
Field.Name: RAID_x0020_Status

Field.Description: The person responsible for resolving this issue.
Field.Name: Resolution_x0020_Assigned_x0020_

Field.Description: Indicate how important the resolution of this issue is to the project, in relation to other issues.
Field.Name: Resolution_x0020_Priority

Field.Description: By what date does this need to be resolved?
Field.Name: Resolution_x0020_Due_x0020_Date

pnp:ListInstance.Title: Shared Documents
pnp:ListInstance.Description: Manage project documents that are shared with everyone who has access to this project site.

pnp:ListInstance.Title: Site Assets
pnp:ListInstance.Description: Use this library to store files which are included on pages within this site, such as images on Wiki pages.

pnp:ListInstance.Title: Tasks and Issues
pnp:ListInstance.Description: Manage tasks, issues, questions and enhancements related to this project.

Field.Name: Related_x0020_Tasks_x002C__x0020
Field.DisplayName: Related Tasks, Issues, Questions or Enhancements

Field.Description: 1 = High Priority / 10 = Low Priority
Field.Name: Issue_x0020_Priority
RoutingRuleDescription
Field.Description: Provide a brief, but thorough, description.
Add your comments to the list of comments related to this issue.
Field.Name: Issue_x0020_Comments

Field.Description: The person responsible for resolving this issue.
Field.Name: Resolution_x0020_Assigned_x0020_

Field.Description: The resolution status of this task or issue.
Field.Name: Issue_x0020_Resolution_x0020_Sta

Field.Description: The date the client signed off on the completion or resolution.
Field.Name: Signoff_x0020_Date

Field.Description: How long will this take to complete?
Field.Name: Estimated_x0020_Hours

Field.Description: How long did this actually take to complete?
Field.Name: Actual_x0020_Hours

Field.Description: Link to relevant content on this project site.
Field.Name: Reference_x0020_Link

pnp:FieldRef.DisplayName: Related Tasks, Issues, Questions or Enhancements

pnp:ListInstance.Title: Workflow Tasks
pnp:ListInstance.Description: This system library was created by the Publishing feature to store workflow tasks that are created in this site.
